text:
The sound of the waves...
They're going "zazaaa... zazaan"

Like it's slowly...
Soaking into me...

Yeah...
and also... the smell of the sea...

Ahh... Now that you mention it, I've heard that
sounds and smells are a big influence on memories.

Ah indeed. It's pretty common for them to trigger
various recollections.

Nfufu～
It's makin' me remember my hometown～
